details:
* [CVE-2014-0231](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-0231)
prevent denial of service in mod\_cgid.
* [CVE-2014-0226](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-0226)
prevent denial of service via race in mod\_status.
* [CVE-2014-0118](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-0118)
fix resource consumption via mod\_deflate body decompression.
* [CVE-2013-6438](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2013-6438)
prevent denial of service via mod\_dav incorrect end of string


For Debian 6 Squeeze, these issues have been fixed in apache2 version 2.2.16-6+squeeze13
